      67             : /**
      68             :  * The compositor-side counterpart to CompositableClient. Responsible for
      69             :  * updating textures and data about textures from IPC and how textures are
      70             :  * composited (tiling, double buffering, etc.).
      71             :  *
      72             :  * Update (for images/canvases) and UpdateThebes (for Thebes) are called during
      73             :  * the layers transaction to update the Compositbale's textures from the
      74             :  * content side. The actual update (and any syncronous upload) is done by the
      75             :  * TextureHost, but it is coordinated by the CompositableHost.
      76             :  *
      77             :  * Composite is called by the owning layer when it is composited. CompositableHost
      78             :  * will use its TextureHost(s) and call Compositor::DrawQuad to do the actual
      79             :  * rendering.
